#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;
typedef vector< vector<int> > Matrix;

const int P = 1e9 + 7;
const int mat[4][4] = {
    {4, 0, 1, 1},
    {0, 0, 1, 0},
    {0, 2, 3, 0},
    {0, 0, 0, 1},
};

Matrix Mul(Matrix a, Matrix b) {
    Matrix c(4, vector<int>(4, 0));
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
        for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
            long long s = 0;
            for (int k = 0; k < 4; ++k)
                s += (long long)a[i][k] * b[k][j];
            c[i][j] = s % P;
        }
    return c;
}

Matrix Pow(Matrix a, int n) {
    n--;
    Matrix ans = a;
    while (n) {
        if (n & 1) ans = Mul(ans, a);
        n >>= 1;
        a = Mul(a, a);
    }
    return ans;
}

int g(int n) {
    Matrix trans(4, vector<int>(4, 0));
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
        for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
            trans[i][j] = mat[i][j];

    Matrix ans = Pow(trans, n);
    return ((long long)ans[0][0] + ans[0][1] + ans[0][2] + 2 * ans[0][3]) % P;
}

int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
        freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    #endif

    int TC;
    scanf("%d", &TC);

    while (TC--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%d\n", g(n));
    }

    return 0;
}
